HEy Bro I Post once a day and that is when I go to bed But I am so COnfused right now as to what is going on in the game. Polar Claw <cycodrone@...> wrote:For future reference, can people make sure that they
don't over post when other players are in a scene. I
realise that most players here are from the states and
that it's easy to forget that some of us are in
different timezones, but it seriously isn't fun when I
have to disregard two or three posts made becasuse
people post over that top of me while i was either
asleep or at work. So if people could remember that in
future it would be appreciated *Steps off his podium
on his high horse and stops ranting*
